description: Arbitrary person-level identifier used to link across tables. PATID of the first patient in the relationship link.

Arbitrary person-level identifier used to link across tables.

PATID of the second patient in the relationship link.

value_description: 01=Birth mother-child 02=Parent-child 03 = Legal guardian - child 04=Spouse or partner 05=Sibling 06= Grandparent-grandchild 07=Other
description:
Code denoting the relationship between the two patients.

The order of the terms indicates directionality.  For instance, if using “birth mother – child”, PATID_1 represents birth mother, PATID_2, the child.
The date the indicated relationship was believed to have started, if known.
The date the indicated relationship was believed to have ended, if known.
